resources.string: Complete Account opening in 2 easy steps:
Please enter a valid account number
Make 13 digit A/C number by removing all dot(.) and add required zero (0) after first six digit as below.

"No biller is registered yet. To pay your bills, you need to add a biller first.
Would you like to add now?"

"You are not allowed to send money with Loyalty Points Card.
Would you like to add other card now?"
PIN length must be six digits
NexusPay requires a version upgrade. Do you want to upgrade now?
Due to inactivity, you have been logged out.
You are going to Transfer Fund as follows:
You are going to Pay Bill to %s as follows:
Please select biller name from the drop-down list.
Blink your eyes several times to capture photo.
Please blink your eyes several times.
You do not have any application to open this link.
Please insert your registered SIM into device and then try again.
Card is not actived. Please pay with another card.
Card info. expired, Please generate again
Tap on a card to select
You will be required to provide the following information to add the digitized version of your %1$s:
Card is suspended. Please contact customer care.
Do not shake your face when capturing photo.
If you change your device or re-install the app, you can use existing information after verifying your identity. Continue?
"%1$s won't work unless you enable Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are missing from your device."
%1$s is having trouble with Google Play services. Please try again.
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are not supported by your device."
"%1$s won't run unless you update Google Play services."
"%1$s won't run without Google Play services, which are currently updating."
New version of Google Play services needed. It will update itself shortly.
"Contact permission denied, Check contact read permission or input manually."
"Unable to get contact, Please try again or input manually."
Permission is useful to access contact.
Due to a inactivity the application will restart
Our customer service experts are ready to help. You can reach by:
Data cannot be synced properly. Try again.
Your transaction is in progress. Please check mini statement.
Card is suspended. Please Call customer care.
Your device change request has been rejected. Please try again.
Device Change has been rejected. Please register again.
Device change failed. Do you want to try again?
Your Loyalty Points Card downloaded, Please check inactive list for other Payment cards (if you have any).
Device change is successful. Now your wallet is initializing. Please wait for completion.
For NFC payment you have to enable NFC and set NexusPay as your default Tap&Pay App from Settings.
For NFC pay set NexusPay as default App. Set Tap & Pay preference?
Do you want to inactivate this card?
ENTER THE FOLLOWING INFORMATION IN PAYMENT WEBSITE
Note: For E-Commerce payment you must have active internet connection.
NB: You can select your nearest branch. This will be your home branch. You have to collect your ATM card and cheque book(if requested) from the selected branch.
Please enter your valid NID No
Please enter amount to be added to your card
Server error. Please try again later.
Something went wrong. Please try again later.
Please enter a valid account number
Amount should be from %1$s to %2$s BDT
%s is invalid amount. Please enter a valid amount.
Contact have no valid Phone No.
Please Enter your valid Mobile Number Operator (MNO).
NexusPay PIN should be 6 digits long
Enter valid phone number and Mobile Operator Name
Required field should not be empty!
Amount should be %1$s BDT to %2$s BDT
Amount should be from %1$s to %2$s BDT
Please provide Read Phone state permission from Settings -> App -> NexusPay
Error occurred to the internal library
Invalid server. Please try again later.
Face is not matched. Please retry.
Payment Information Expired. Please generate again to purchase.
Failed to capture device fingerprint. Please contact your system admin.
Failed to generate Payment Data, Please try again.
NexusPay Loyalty Points Card download will be attempted again when you Log in next time.
Enjoy cash back and other rewards using NexusPay Loyalty Points Card.
To reset your NexusPay PIN, a 6-digit code will be sent to your registered mobile number.
To reset your NexusPay PIN, you need a 6 digit verification code from the customer care. Continue?
Remove your eye glass(if have any).
Some features in %1$s may not work properly without HMS Core, which is not installed on your device.
%1$s is unable to use HMS Core. Launch Optimizer (Phone Manager) or go to Settings, enable all permissions for %2$s (including auto-launch and secondary launch), and try again.
It appears that you have an unofficial version of HMS Core (%1$s) installed on your device. Please uninstall HMS Core from Settings and return to this app to install the official version.
Please enter all inputs to proceed!!!
Invalid Service Found, Please try with another service
"Failed to generate Payment Info. Try again with internet connection."
Your add card request has been sent to server for verification. You will be notified upon successful verification
"Can't save smart card service apk to SD card"
Could not initialize your Kona card. Please try again to initialize your card.
The card was initialized on other device
You can remove your card now. Please give a name of your card.
Could not initialize your card. Please try again after sometime.
Touch the card on your phone. If you have already tapped the card then please remove and tap again.
Bar code could not be generated due to an unexpected error. Please try again later.
QR code could not be generated due to an unexpected error. Please try again later.
An error occurred on the server. Please contact the customer center or try again.
Please select a default card to pay.
Device change request has been sent to server for verification. You will be notified upon successful verification
Error occurred while payment key parsing
This card is not initialized with this device.
Device is not secured to run this application
Some features of this app need smart card service. Do you want to install smart card service?
Tap your card on the phone
Touch the card to clone service.
"Touch the card for the new service issuance (about 1 min for the issuance)"
No internet connection. Please connect to internet then try again.
"Please click Payment finish button after finish transaction."
"Please tap your mobile phone to POS within"
PIN can not contain only whitespace
PIN length should be %d to %d digits long
Do you want to proceed with %s?
Required data for transaction is not present
Service Data is corrupted. Could not save service data
Touch the card for your requested service update
"Card Read successful for %s. Please see the terminal for details."
Failed to generate transaction data, Please try later.
Transaction tokens are expired. Please go online to automatically fetch tokens.
This card has invalid transaction data.
Please click back again to exit.
Unable to process transaction with data Invalid data form Payment SDK.
Something went wrong, Please try again with connection.
Card name can not be empty.
Required service information not found for activation
AppIntro is a library for making a cool intro in your Android apps.
Make sure there is enough light around.
To use NexusPay Wallet you need to authenticate your identity by Face ID Verification
Do you want to logout from NexusPay?
Switch to clock mode for the time input.
Switch to text input mode for the time input.
You have exceeded selfie capture limit. Please call to customer care to know more.
A problem seems to have occurred. Please check your internet connection. If the problem persists contact with call center on 16216 for assistance.
Please, provide all the required permission(s) to proceed further.
Application Internal SDK is corrupted. Please update to latest version or contact customer support center.
Select your current mobile network operator
You must enter the additional consumer data
You must enter the customer label
You must enter the invoice number
You must enter the loyalty number
You must enter the Merchant Channel
You must enter the Merchant Tax ID
You must enter the mobile number
You must enter the purpose of transaction
You must enter the reference label
You must enter the store label
You must enter the terminal label
Tap to switch to selecting a day
Tap to switch to selecting a year
TAP ON THE POS TO PURCHASE
No account found for selected card
No card found! Please add a card.
You have no other card to select.
Feature not available in toll card
"No internet Connection ! Make sure that Wi-Fi or cellular mobile data is turned on, then try again."
No internet access. Please try again with connection.
Check this section for updates, offers and general notifications.
No New Notifications! Please try later.
No Service Found, Please try with another service
You will be required to provide the following information to add balance from your %1$s:
"*You will get 10% bonus on your first transferred amount. *Transferred amount from other bank and bonus can be used in NexusPay Purchase and Mobile TopUp."
An SMS with OTP has been sent to
Thank you for using NexusPay app, please complete rest of the account opening process at the earliest of your convenience.
Send Money from Loyalty Points Card is not allowed. Please change card to perform Send Money.
Request sender to scan this QR
Thanks for the permission. Please proceed.
You must crop your NID photo.
"Please call our Helpline (16216) to request your verification code"
Place your face in photo frame.
Please select VISA/Mastercard from card list to make this payment
Your Loyalty Points Card is currently suspended. Please Call customer care.
REQUEST MERCHANT TO SCAN THE CODE
Transferred amount from other bank and bonus can be used in NexusPay purchase and mobile recharge.
You will get 25% bonus on your first transferred amount.
Your wallet has been activated in another device.
Registration has been rejected. Please register again.
Your wallet has been suspended. Please call our helpline (16216) for further inquiry.
Enter the following information to register at Binimoy portal
Please call our 24 hours Call Center at 16216 to activate your NexusPay.
Your last request is still being processed. Please wait a while.
Please Allow Read Phone State Permission
Scan the back side of NID card with camera
Scan the front side of NID card with camera
Battery is low. Please use the rest of the payment method.
Invalid QR Code, Please try again.
Invalid QR, Please try again with other QR.
You are going to pay ৳ %1$s to %2$s.
Place the code within the frame
SDK not Initialize, Pls try again
"Hook app detected in your device, Exiting Application."
"Hook app detected in your device, Exiting Application."
"Malware application found in your device. Please clean it. Exiting Application."
Your device is rooted and vulnerable to security threats.
Your current card is not activated. Please change your card.
Send Money from Loyalty Points Card is not allowed. Please change card or add a Nexus Debit/Nexus Credit/Rocket/Agent Banking card to perform Send Money by NexusPay.
Send Money from Loyalty Points Card is not allowed. Please change selected card from dashboard.
You are going to send %1$s to %2$s %3$s.
"Sorry, the server is temporarily unavailable. Please check your network connection or contack us."
Single prominent face cannot be detected.
You can pay your bills from your wallet. Any time from any place 24/7
Experience new forms of payments like never before.
Your Nexus debit and credit cards and Rocket account from a single interface. Choose the preferred payment card with a single touch.
All your cards in one wallet
Sending Money from and to your account and also other account possible only by few tapping.
Access your bank account and manage your account activities all different types of account from a single screen.
Please check the Terms and Conditions
This branch is not active now!
Successfully Saved your Receipt at App Gallery.
Enter a valid mobile number to continue
This e-KYC requires you to complete your identity verification
Nick Name can not be empty
"You don't have any beneficiary added to perform fund transfer"
"You don't have any beneficiary added to perform send money"
Please enter routing number or select bank/branch from list
This receipt has been generated electronically
Please Scan a valid NID photo.
Special Character not allowed in Narration except . () - _:
Special Character not allowed in Name except . () - _:
This beneficiary is currently %1$s. You are going to %2$s this beneficiary.

"Thank you for registering NexusPay on your device. You can now open DBBL Account from NexusPay App.
You just need to go through some simple steps which will help us to build a secure system together."

In order to digitize an account, we need to ensure your identity for the safeguards of your account maintained with us, please make sure of your identity by providing your valid NID card along with your real time selfie to comply with eKYC requirements. Since we are a Banking Industry, we abide by the law. You are requested to go through few simple steps by clicking \"VERIFY NOW\" which will help us to build secured system together. You can come later as well, just click \"NOT NOW\" if you want to process the verification later.
Time limit exceeded. Failed to process transaction.
"* For bank account and card number, enter hardware/software token. * For Rocket account, enter OTP."
Your NexusPay Toll Card has been Activated.
Your request for adding new vehicle has been submitted. You will receive a confirmation once it has been reviewed and processed.
Please call our 24-hours Call Center at 16216
TAP TO ACTIVATE YOUR TOLL CARD
Note : You need to Add Money and maintain sufficient balance to avail Fast Track at above Toll Points.
You are going to TopUp ৳ %1$s to %2$s.
Please turn your face left as per instruction.
Please turn your face right as per instruction.
Transaction amount must be 1 BDT or higher
Both input and output Uri must be specified
Therefore, override color resource (ucrop_color_toolbar_widget) in your app to make it work on pre-L devices
Note: Name length cannot exceed 15 letters
This user is not allowed to use this app
Permission is mandatory for this task.
"Permission Denied. App won't read SMS for verification code."
Your last request is still being processed. Please wait a while.
Please visit your nearest branch within account expiry date
Request Time Out. Please Try Again Later
Please Enter Valid Account Type to Proceed!!!
Please connect Date of Birth to Reset Pin!!!
Please Enter Valid Email Address to Proceed!!!
GPS Must be enabled to use Binimoy services!!
GPS Must Be Enabled In order to Proceed!!!
Please Enter Valid VID Pattern to Proceed!!!
Please complete the following steps for account opening.
You have %1$d attempt%2$s left. After that your NexusPay PIN will be reset.
